lyrics.text:
Ha’u tamaiki, haʻu ‘o tukupā!
‘Oku maʻu ‘a Hēvani ‘i he faingata’a.
‘Oua, ‘oua, te mou loto si’i
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘o e Tau te ne tokoni’i,
Laka, laka, ‘oua ilifia,
Laka, hiva, hiva fiefia!

Ha’u tamaiki, ha’u ‘o tukupā!
Ko e fuka ‘oku tuʻu, ko e ta’ata’a.
‘Oua, ‘oua sio ki māman
i
,
Pe tokanga ki he lau kākā ‘a Sētan
i
,
Laka, laka, ‘oua ilifia.
Laka hiva, hiva fiefia!

Ha’u tamaiki, haʻu ‘o tukupā!
‘Oku ai ha fili ‘oku taau ke mou tā.
‘Oua ‘e lau pē, “Ko e si’i au,”
‘E tangane mai ‘a Langi, ‘alu ki he tau.
Laka, laka, ‘oua ilifia.
Laka hiva, hiva fiefia!

Haʻu tamaiki, haʻu ‘o tukupā!
Ho’mou ‘ofa ki he tau haʻu ‘o fakahā.
“Pā, ē pā ē, te te mate mu’a;
‘E ‘ikai te u kalo ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Otua.”
Laka, laka, ‘oua ilifia.
Laka hiva, hiva fiefia!
